item.title: 大众汽车集团携新车型和内部辅助驾驶系统重返中国市场
item.description: 本周二，大众汽车集团在上海展示了为中国开发的五款新车型和一套内部辅助驾驶系统，以期在竞争激烈的中国市场重新赢得份额。【原文：Volkswagen Group showcased five new models developed for China and an in-house assisted driving system on Tuesday in Shanghai as it fights to win back share in the fiercely competitive market.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，人工智能带来的经济收益可能超过排放成本
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二表示，人工智能带来的经济收益将在2025年至2030年间使全球产出每年提高约0.5%，超过运行人工智能模型所需的数据中心碳排放增加所带来的成本。【原文：Economic gains from artificial intelligence will boost global output by around 0.5% a year between 2025 and 2030, outweighing the costs of rising carbon emissions by the data centres needed to run AI models, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织下调日本经济增长预期，原因是特朗普征收关税
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二下调了对日本经济增长的预测，并预计受美国提高关税的影响，日本央行的加息步伐将慢于预期。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday cut its economic growth forecast for Japan and projected the central bank would lift interest rates at a slower-than-expected pace due to the impact of higher U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储哈克称美国贫困水平可能被低估
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）周二表示，美国的真实贫困水平可能被低估了，他的评论并未涉及货币政策和经济前景。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said on Tuesday the true level of poverty in the United States might be understated, in comments that did not address the monetary policy and economic outlook.】

item.title: 英国食品和服装集团 M&S 披露网络事件
item.description: 英国玛莎百货公司（Marks & Spencer）周二表示，该公司在过去几天里一直在处理一起网络事件，并对其商店的运营进行了一些临时调整。【原文：Britain's Marks & Spencer said on Tuesday it has been managing a cyber incident over the past few days, and had made some temporary changes to its store operations.】

item.title: 波音将以 105.5 亿美元向 Thoma Bravo 出售部分数字航空解决方案业务
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，将以 105.5 亿美元的价格向私募股权公司 Thoma Bravo 出售其数字航空解决方案业务的一部分。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it will sell portions of its Digital Aviation Solutions business to private equity firm Thoma Bravo for $10.55 billion.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，随着经济增长放缓，新兴经济体面临资金收紧的考验
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二下调了包括墨西哥和中国在内的新兴经济体2025年的增长前景，并警告说，融资条件的收紧和发展现金的匮乏可能会给发展中国家带来痛苦。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday cut its 2025 growth outlook for emerging economies including Mexico and China, warning that tighter funding conditions and a scarcity of development cash could inflict pain on developing nations.】

item.title: T-Mobile 的 Metro 推出价格更低的预付费计划，价格锁定 5 年
item.description: T-Mobile 的预付费部门周二发布了四项新计划，提供五年价格保证，每条线路的月费低至 25 美元，在经济不确定的情况下，该公司试图保护其市场份额不受竞争影响。【原文：T-Mobile's prepaid unit unveiled four new plans on Tuesday that provide a five-year price guarantee and monthly charges as low as $25 per line, as the company seeks to shield its market share from competition amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国征收百年来最高关税，国际货币基金组织下调多数国家经济增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二下调了对美国、中国和大多数国家经济增长的预测，理由是美国关税的影响现已达到百年新高，并警告说进一步的贸易紧张局势将使经济增长进一步放缓。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday slashed its forecasts for growth in the United States, China and most countries, citing the impact of U.S. tariffs now at 100-year highs, and warning that further trade tensions would slow growth further.】

item.title: 宝诗健康称卡尔-伊坎持有公司约 34% 的股份
item.description: 亿万富翁卡尔-伊坎（Carl Icahn）在周二提交的一份文件中称，他持有 Bausch Health 公司约 34% 的普通股。【原文：Billionaire Carl Icahn has a total economic exposure of about 34% to Bausch Health's common shares, the healthcare firm said in a filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 避险游戏：经济体的黄金持有量与国债持有量对比
item.description: 特朗普政府一而再、再而三地征收关税的做法令全球市场大跌眼镜，促使投资者寻求黄金等避险资产的庇护。【原文：The Trump administration's on again, off again approach to tariffs have whipsawed global markets, prompting investors to seek shelter in safe haven assets such as gold.】

item.title: 高盛数据显示，对冲基金 2025 年的抛售重点是自由裁量权股票
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的一份主要经纪报告显示，对冲基金正在逃离那些提供消费者想要但不需要的自由支配物品和服务的公司股票，这表明他们预计经济将出现衰退。【原文：Hedge funds are fleeing the stocks of companies that provide discretionary items and services consumers want but do not need, in a sign they anticipate an economic downturn, a Goldman Sachs prime brokerage note showed.】

item.title: 印度 HCLTech 公司季度收入略低于预期
item.description: 由于全球宏观经济的不确定性打击了需求，印度第三大软件服务供应商 HCLTech 公布的 1 月至 3 月季度收入略低于预期。【原文：HCLTech , India's third-largest software services provider, posted slightly lower-than-expected revenue for the January-to-March quarter, as global macroeconomic uncertainties hit demand.】

item.title: 抵押贷款业务好于预期提升了 Equifax 的季度利润
item.description: 受抵押贷款信用报告查询量降幅小于预期的影响，征信机构 Equifax 周二公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Credit bureau Equifax beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter profit on Tuesday, buoyed by a smaller-than-expected drop in inquiries for mortgage credit reports.】

item.title: 大选临近，澳大利亚领导人誓言坚决反对社交媒体年龄限制
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内斯（Anthony Albanese）表示，他预计社交媒体巨头将向他施压，要求他放宽澳大利亚即将实施的禁止儿童使用其平台的禁令，而反对党自由党领袖彼得-达顿（Peter Dutton）在周二的选举辩论中也非常赞同他的观点。【原文：Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said he expects to receive pressure from social media giants to ease Australia's impending ban on children using their platforms, with opposition Liberal leader Peter Dutton keen to agree with him in an election debate on Tuesday.】

item.title: 法国法院命令市场监督机构审查维旺迪的分拆事宜
item.description: 巴黎上诉法院周二裁定，法国市场监督机构必须重新考虑，在前媒体集团维旺迪（Vivendi）去年完成数十亿欧元的拆分时，是否有必要提出强制收购要约。【原文：The Paris court of appeals ruled on Tuesday the French market watchdog must reconsider whether a mandatory buyout offer is or was necessary when the former media conglomerate Vivendi completed its multibillion-euro split last year.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔：欧洲央行接近实现通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者彼得-卡齐米尔说，欧洲央行可能会在未来几个月内实现其 2% 的通胀目标，但更广泛的经济前景太不确定，该行无法就下一步政策举措提供任何有意义的指导。【原文：The European Central Bank could hit its 2% inflation target in the coming few months but the broader economic outlook is far too uncertain for the bank to provide any meaningful guidance about its next policy move, ECB policymaker Peter Kazimir said.】

item.title: 印度塔塔通信公司因数据服务需求而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 本周二，印度塔塔通讯公司（Tata Communications）公布第四季度利润增长 15%，主要得益于数据服务需求的增长。【原文：India's Tata Communications reported a 15% rise in its fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by higher demand for its data services.】

item.title: 穆迪第一季度业绩稳健，因市场波动下调盈利预期
item.description: 穆迪周二公布第一季度利润增长，主要得益于其分析部门的强劲发展势头和债券发行量的回升。【原文：Moody's reported higher first-quarter profit on Tuesday, on strong momentum in its analytics unit and a pickup in bond issuance, but it tempered expectations for the year due to the market volatility.】

item.title: 券商普遍看好英伟达支持的 CoreWeave
item.description: 华尔街券商周二开始对英伟达（Nvidia）支持的 CoreWeave 公司进行报道，并普遍看好该公司的前景，尽管该公司在首次公开募股和首次上市后表现平平，未能获得投资者的青睐。【原文：Wall Street brokerages on Tuesday began coverage of Nvidia-backed CoreWeave with broadly bullish views, although the stock has failed to gain traction with investors following a lackluster initial public offering and market debut.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所期货因油价和金价上涨而上涨
item.description: 受大宗商品价格上涨提振，加拿大主要股指期货周二上涨，在前一交易日暴跌后反弹。【原文：Futures for Canada's main stock index rose on Tuesday, bouncing back after the index tumbled in the previous session, boosted by gains in commodity prices.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司季度利润因国防需求回升而增长
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周二公布第一季度利润增长，并重申了对今年的预测，原因是对其导弹系统和战斗机的需求保持强劲。【原文：Lockheed Martin reported a higher first-quarter profit on Tuesday and reaffirmed its forecasts for the year on the back of resilient demand for its missile systems and fighter jets.】

item.title: 少数股东表示，石油集团 Equinor 必须对气候差异做出解释
item.description: 一群小股东周二表示，挪威 Equinor 公司董事会必须解释该公司提高石油和天然气产量的计划如何与其对遏制气候变化的巴黎协议所做的承诺保持一致。【原文：The board of Norway's Equinor must explain how the company's plan to raise oil and gas production aligns with its stated commitment to the Paris agreement on curbing climate change, a group of minority shareholders said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 产品需求强劲，MSCI 第一季度利润增长
item.description: 指数提供商摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二公布第一季度利润增长，原因是客户支出的增加推动了对其指数产品和分析服务的需求。【原文：Index provider MSCI reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Tuesday, as improved spending by clients drove up demand for its index products and analytics services.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司因 B-21 损失利润减半，股价暴跌
item.description: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）周二公布的第一季度利润下降了 49%，原因是该美国承包商的 B-21 隐形轰炸机项目因制造成本上升而出现亏损，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了约 7%。【原文：Northrop Grumman posted a 49% drop in first-quarter profit on Tuesday as the U.S. contractor booked losses on its B-21 stealth bomber program due to higher manufacturing costs, sending its shares down about 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 汇丰中国最高财富银行家调任，亚洲财富主管迁至上海
item.description: 汇丰银行负责中国业务的高级财富管理经理将在不久后的亚洲领导层调整中离职，该银行还将在中国的数字财富项目中裁减数百个职位。【原文：HSBC's top wealth manager overseeing China will leave the role soon in an Asian leadership reshuffle, as the lender also cuts hundreds of jobs from its digital wealth project in China.】

item.title: 印度 Airtel 公司将从阿达尼公司购买 5G 频谱
item.description: 印度电信运营商巴帝电信公司（Bharti Airtel）周二表示，该公司将从阿达尼企业（Adani Enterprises）旗下一家公司购买 5G 电信频谱。【原文：Indian telecom operator Bharti Airtel will buy 5G telecom spectrum from a unit of Adani Enterprises , the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行称董事会建议 2024 年派发创纪录股息
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行储蓄银行（Sberbank）周二表示，董事会建议支付创纪录的 7869 亿卢布（96.8 亿美元）股息。【原文：Russia's largest lender Sberbank said on Tuesday that its board recommended paying a record high 786.9 billion roubles ($9.68 billion) in dividends.】

item.title: 关税将推高成本，金佰利下调年度利润预期
item.description: 金佰利公司周二下调了年度利润预期，因为这家面巾纸生产商警告说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的广泛贸易关税将推高其供应链成本。【原文：Kimberly-Clark slashed its annual profit forecast on Tuesday as the Kleenex tissue maker warned that U.S. President Donald Trump's broad-based trade tariffs would push up its supply-chain costs.】

item.title: 巴里克黄金公司将以 11 亿美元的价格向约翰-保尔森和 NovaGold 出售阿拉斯加矿山股份
item.description: 加拿大巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold）周二表示，将以不超过 11 亿美元的价格向亿万富翁约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）和新星黄金资源公司（NovaGold Resources）出售其持有的阿拉斯加 Donlin 黄金项目 50%的股份，从而退出该项目。【原文：Canada's Barrick Gold said on Tuesday it will exit the Donlin Gold Project in Alaska by selling its 50% stake to billionaire John Paulson and NovaGold Resources for up to $1.1 billion.】
